comments:
I have exported myd rcp project as a webstart application (deployable feature).
Starting the application over the web works fine, but I can't start the help
that is included in the application. If I export the project as a product
everything works fine, even the help. It seems there is something wrong with the
Tomcat server. Below is the tomcat logfile catalina.2005-09-28.log:
